title: [TRADED] Babe Ruth FS/T, Sport Kings, PSA, Well Centered, Want T206 HOF ! !
author: GoBigRed

posts.post_title: [TRADED] Babe Ruth FS/T, Sport Kings, PSA, Well Centered, Want T206 HOF ! !
posts.post_content:
[TRADED]

Want to Sell, or Trade, my 1933 Goudey Sport Kings Babe Ruth, PSA-3.

Centered, Nice-for-Grade ! !

For Sale:  $1,899 NTM (net-to-me)

For Trade:  Looking for T206 HOFers, PSA only, non-Portrait desired for those with multiple variations.  

I have a Beckley, Bresnahan, Cobb & Mathewson, looking for all other HOFers, a Walter Johnson or Cy Young would be nice.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/GoBigRed/1933-goudey-sport-kings/40926/1933-babe-ruth[/IMG]
Bump, added "For Sale" option to post ......
